divs: sighting detailsabout 11:15 pm in my backyard, i was reviewing the sky. i am a amateur astronomer, so it is something i do. noticed a triangle object directly overhead. the flying object visibly a triangle (no visible wings, was able to visualize the shape) and on each point of the triangle flying object bright yellow \ gold lights (not blinking or pulsating) no noise. flying object moving out of the west flying east. object was flying in a straight path. i continued to watch until it moved beyond my sight. i didn't notice any planes in the area. i was disappointed i didn't have my phone or camera to take a photograph. i plan to make sure that doesn't happen again.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Battle Creek
There were no other sightings in Battle Creek on or around August 10th 2013
Summary: Noticed a quiet tringel object with three lights located at each point of the triangle. Lights were not blinking or changing colors,
